<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> [[Image:setTriggerArea.jpg|thumb|300px|Trigger axis a, b and c (''half'' of their x, y and z dimensions)]] Defines the area monitored by the given trigger. The area could be either rectangular or elliptical.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 
Just like with a and b dimensions, c dimension will alter area in opposite directions from the trigger position along z axis. Therefore if the trigger position is on the surface, half of the trigger area will be above the surface and half below. To place the whole area above the surface, adjust trigger position (move it up c meters). If c is not specified or &lt;<template><title>=</title></template> 0, the trigger's height is considered infinite like 2D triggers.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setTriggerArea''' [a, b, angle, isRectangle, c]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - object of the type "EmptyDetector"

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [a, b, angle, isRectangle, c]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> a: [[Number]] - trigger area X size / 2, in meters

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> b: [[Number]] - trigger area Y size / 2, in meters

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> angle: [[Number]] - trigger area rotation in degrees

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> isRectangle: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if rectangle

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> c: [[Number]] - (Optional) trigger area Z size / 2, in meters. -1 for infinite height <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.59.135137</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_trigger [[setTriggerArea]] [100, 50, 45, [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_trigger [[setTriggerArea]] [100, 50, 45, [[false]], 100];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_trg = [[createTrigger]] ["EmptyDetector", [[getPos]] [[player]], [[false]]];
_trg [[setTriggerArea]] [5, 5, 0, [[false]]];
_trg [[setTriggerActivation]] ["CIV", "PRESENT", [[true]]];
_trg [[setTriggerStatements]] ["[[Magic Variables#this_2|this]]", "[[hint]] 'Civilian near player'", "[[hint]] 'no civilian near'"];</code>
